      • getItems

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> getItems​(java.lang.Double fillFactor)
        Returns a list of items based on their fill factor. This method is used by the fridge to display items that are running low and need to be replenished. getItems( 0.5 ) - will return any items that are 50% or less full, including items that are depleted. Unless all available containers are empty, this method should only consider the non-empty containers when calculating the overall fillFactor for a given item.
        Parameters:
        fillFactor -
        Returns:
        a map of item type to it fill factor

      • getFillFactor

        java.lang.Double getFillFactor​(long itemType)
        Returns the fill factor of a bin for a given item type.
        Parameters:
        itemType -
        Returns:
        a double representing the fill factor for the item type

      • forgetItem

        void forgetItem​(long itemType)
        Removed all items of the particular type from the storage.
        Parameters:
        itemType - - indicates item type
